data.details: Go outside to check the weather.

data.outcome_description: At 04:10 PM on Monday, May 19, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Isabella Rossi went outside.

data.narrative: At 04:10 PM (Local time for New York), Isabella Rossi steps out onto the sidewalk. The sun, bright and warm for a mid-May afternoon, immediately hits her face. The air is still, carrying the faint aroma of exhaust fumes and blooming flowers from the nearby park. A delivery cyclist (npc_concept_delivery_01) zips past, weaving through the sparse pedestrian traffic heading home from work. The street is bathed in the clear, golden light of late afternoon.

discovered_npcs.name: Delivery Cyclist
discovered_npcs.description: A delivery cyclist weaving through traffic.
